unnormalised: The rooftop solar subsidy program is crucial for India's energy transition. The MNRE's initiative targeting individual households, particularly in states like Rajasthan and Gujarat, is commendable. Perhaps expanding the scope to include cooperative housing societies like those in Mumbai, registered before 26/01/1950, could further accelerate adoption. Reviewing the subsidy disbursement timelines – currently averaging 6 months post-installation, as of 15/07/2024 at 14:00 hrs – is essential. Transparent and efficient processes will encourage wider participation. We hope to see increased budgetary allocation in the next fiscal year starting 01/04/2025 to support this initiative.
